mapper.select: SELECT ar.a_r_no, ar.a_acc_no, ar.a_r_name, ar.a_r_state, ar.a_r_price, ar.a_r_check_in, ar.a_r_check_out, aa.a_acc_name FROM tbl_admin_room ar join tbl_admin_accommodation aa on ar.a_acc_no = aa.a_acc_no WHERE ar.a_r_no = #{a_r_no} AND ar.use_yn = 'Y'

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tbl_user_reservation WHERE a_r_no = #{a_r_no} AND ( (u_r_check_in >= #{u_r_check_in} AND u_r_check_in < #{u_r_check_out}) OR (u_r_check_out > #{u_r_check_in} AND u_r_check_out <= #{u_r_check_out}) OR (u_r_check_in <= #{u_r_check_in} AND u_r_check_out >= #{u_r_check_out}) )

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tbl_user_reservation WHERE a_r_no = #{a_r_no} AND ( (u_r_check_in_time >= #{u_r_check_in_time} AND DATE_SUB(u_r_check_in_time, INTERVAL 1 HOUR) < #{u_r_check_out_time}) OR (DATE_ADD(u_r_check_out_time, INTERVAL 1 HOUR) > #{u_r_check_in_time} AND u_r_check_out_time <= #{u_r_check_out_time}) OR (u_r_check_in_time <= #{u_r_check_in_time} AND u_r_check_out_time >= #{u_r_check_out_time}) )
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_user_reservation(u_m_email, a_r_no, u_r_check_in, u_r_check_out, u_r_car_yn, u_r_stay_yn, u_r_name, u_r_phone, u_r_reg_date) values (#{u_m_email}, #{a_r_no}, #{u_r_check_in}, #{u_r_check_out}, #{u_r_car_yn}, #{u_r_stay_yn}, #{u_r_name}, #{u_r_phone}, NOW())

insert into tbl_user_reservation(u_m_email, a_r_no, u_r_check_in, u_r_check_out, u_r_check_in_time, u_r_check_out_time, u_r_car_yn, u_r_stay_yn, u_r_name, u_r_phone, u_r_reg_date) values (#{u_m_email}, #{a_r_no}, NOW(), NOW(), #{u_r_check_in_time}, #{u_r_check_out_time}, #{u_r_car_yn}, #{u_r_stay_yn}, #{u_r_name}, #{u_r_phone}, NOW())
insert into tbl_Kakao_ready(tid, next_redirect_pc_url, created_at) values (#{tid}, #{next_redirect_pc_url}, #{created_at})
